example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS تحدث) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN_PROP العريضي)) (PP-CLR (PREP عن) (NP (PUNC ") (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المسؤولية)) (SBAR (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON التي)) (S (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تنحصر) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (PP (PREP ب) (NP (NOUN رأي) (NP (POSS_PRON_1S ي)))) (PP-CLR (PREP في) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_DU_GEN موقعين) (ADJ+NSUFF_MASC_DU_GEN اساسيين))) (PUNC :))))))))

arg.g: in my Opinion in two key sectors:
